summary: 2 Danish friends are tired of their employer and open their own butcher shop. An electrician accidentally dies in the freezer and he's sold as marinated chicken and business picks up. What happens when they run out of "chicken"?
cast: Nikolaj Lie Kaas|Mads Mikkelsen|Line Kruse|Ole Thestrup|Bodil Jørgensen|Aksel Erhardtsen|Lily Weiding|Nicolas Bro|Camilla Bendix|Elsebeth Steentoft|Kjeld Nørgaard|Peter Reichhardt|Kristian Halken|Lars Ranthe|Mikkel Vadsholt|Søren Thomsen|Mia Lyhne|André Lundemann|Jeppe Kaas|Tomas Villum Jensen|Peter Lambert|Jakob Cedergren|Frans Rubæk|Henning Lajer|Christina Meyer|Sofia Meyer|Oscar Meyer|Sanno|Finn Kyhn|Charlotte Pedersen|Birgit Olsen|Per Holm Henriksen|Kim Ruusuunen|Flemming Sønderborg|Peter Steincke|Peter Silberg|Kirsten Anderson|Hanne Løvendahl|Laura Meyer|Dany Verissimo-Petit
title: De grønne slagtere
